'''''Lightning-Riding Adventurer (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete 24 Open World mechanism-activated [[Time Trial Challenge]]s on [[Watatsumi Island]] and [[Seirai Island]] in Inazuma.
